text: Joseph Robert "Bob" Kerrey (born August 27, 1943) is an American politician. He served as the 35th Governor of Nebraska from 1983 to 1987 and as a United States Senator from Nebraska from 1989 to 2001. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He ran for President in 1992. He was also awarded the medal of honor for his courageous actions while a part of SEAL team 1 in Vietnam. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:1992 United States presidential candidates Category:United States senators from Nebraska Category:Governors of Nebraska Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Bob Kerrey
